content: Stocks Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 27 Feb 2019Netflix at new highs after strong oscar performance. However does this news actually raise fundamentals?5 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (5)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Leonard TanLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 01 Mar 2019If you followed Oscars closely, its not merely just headline news about NFLX winning awards for Alfonso Cuaron's Roma.NFLX's overall win comes- because it validates their ability to continuously generate original content for its suscribers, in an age where rivals: Disney, WarnerMedia, NBCUniversal and others are snatching back their own content to help feed potential audiences for their own competing streaming services.NFLX made a huge bet on a small pool of A-list directors and although missing out on the most contended- Best Picture, NFLX's acheivements considering its status as the new kid on the block, putting existing movie giants to shame.NFLX has proven its ability from previous successes to produce mainstream media. Now, this success paves the way for future artistic firm producers to aspire listing their shows on NFLX's platform for its unparalled audience reach. The movie and entertainment industry is just beginning to change, and I believe NFLX is positioned at the forefront. So while this news might not change Fundamentals per-se, its validates shareholders who see long term value and growth in NFLX.0 comments0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 28 Feb 2019No it does not. Maybe people trade on news causing the share price to go up. But these are just speculations.0 comments0

Isaac Chan, Business  at NUSLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 28 Feb 2019I don't think this would affect the fundamentals of netflix, like the others mentioned, perception of netflix would be different. I think this shows that netflix is doing the right thing and is producing great quality content that can compete firmly with the rest of hollywood. Maybe investors thought that netflix couldn't match up to the rest. I think the surge in share prices could also signal in part to investors that netflix presents an edge over its other competitors.0 comments0

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 28 Feb 2019I don't think fundamentals change because of this. what changes is people's perception of it, as well as investor sentiments regarding the stock. the stock price may rise because people now expect more out of it.0 comments0

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 27 Feb 2019Fundamentals do not change, what changes is peopleâ€™s expectations. This is similar to when apple releases a new product; nothing really changes but investors expect people rush to buy the new product.0 comments0
